CustomField.formula: IF( Total_of_Activities__c < 5, IMAGE("https://na13.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9h&oid=00D4W000005k17D","1 Star",20,100), IF(Total_of_Activities__c < 10, IMAGE("https://na13.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=0154W00000CMt9i&oid=00D4W000005k17D", "3 Stars",20,100), IMAGE("https://na13.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file= 0154W00000CMt9j&oid=00D4W000005k17D", "5 Stars",20,100)))
CustomField.label: Activity Indicator
